tool_description: Detects and analyzes text encoding of files to ensure proper character interpretation during text extraction.

file_path.description: Path to the text file for encoding detection

sample_size.description: Number of bytes to sample for detection (1024-65536)

error_messages: File not found: The specified file path does not exist or is not accessible.
Binary file detected: The file appears to be binary rather than text content.
Invalid sample size: sample_size must be between 1024 and 65536 bytes.
Encoding detection failed: Unable to determine text encoding with sufficient confidence.
usage: Provide file_path to analyze text encoding. Adjust sample_size for very large files or when detection accuracy is critical.

detected_encoding.description: The most likely text encoding (utf-8, latin-1, etc.)

alternative_encodings.description: List of other possible encodings with lower confidence
